content: Oh? You think this style suits me? I trust your judgment. Then this shall be my look for the day.
info: NPC常驻换装玩法-1005幻雪_NPC换装

content: {A疑惑}Yeep? Which outfit should I try? Such an air of uncertainty... how mysterious.
info: NPC常驻换装玩法-1005幻雪_NPC换装

content: You gave me a new outfit, but... it looks exactly the same. {A灵光一现}Could it be... a mysterious phenomenon?! <style=SizeSmall>Noted: Any clothes from <style=PlayerName>{me}</style> will revert into the same piece...</style>
info: NPC常驻换装玩法-1005幻雪_NPC换装
